H0.text: Which Isle of Man resident, who was massive in Albania, died in October. Nigel Mansell

H1.text: Which Isle of Man resident, who was massive in Albania, died in October. Mark Cavendish

H2.text: Which Isle of Man resident, who was massive in Albania, died in October. Jeremy Clarkson

H3.text: Which Isle of Man resident, who was massive in Albania, died in October. Norman Wisden

A4.text: He died on 4 October 2010 at Abbotswood nursing home on the Isle of Man, aged 95.

A5.text: Wisdom was awarded the Freedom of the City of both London and Tirana in 1995.
